text: 22.5 Apo 9.2 Gelɨgɨpin anɨb ak, bɨ God nop sɨbogep bɨawl yɨbɨl ak ayɨp, bɨ Juda bɨawl takaw tɨg asɨkep okok mɨdupsek ayɨp kɨlop agnɨgɨnɨmɨb agak. Agnɨgem, ne yepɨs agup ma agɨnɨgabal, nɨŋɨd agup agɨnɨgabal agak. Bɨawl anɨb okok, yad taun Damaskus amnɨg genek, yɨp mɨj ogɨnap tɨk ñɨlak agak. Mɨj anɨb ak, bɨ chɨn Damaskus yelak kɨlop tɨkɨl agɨlak, Sol nop kodenɨmɨb, ne Damaskus binɨb Jisas nop gos lɨnepal okok kɨlop nag lɨl, dad Jelusalem awl apek kɨlop pak nag lɨnɨgun agɨl tɨkɨlak agak. Pen Sol ne mɨj anɨb ak dɨl, kɨlop nag lɨl dad Jelusalem ownɨmuŋ agɨl gos nɨgɨlak agak.
